main event: An unidentified object was observed in Toulab, France on July 11, 1955.
interesting points: The object was first seen as a brilliant white light with no sound or trail., It was observed to descend and then ascend without making any noise., The object was suspended in midair and appeared to rotate like a pendulum., The size of the object decreased as it streaked off out of view., The observation lasted for about 10 minutes.
